context: I really like Deadpool, can you recommend a similar movie?
I am also a HUGE Deadpool fan. Check out Star Trek: First Contact and X-Men. They're both awesome.
Is it the movie by Hugh Jackman?
Yes! X-Men has Hugh Jackman in it. He's also in The Wolverine and Van Helsing.
I like Hugh Jackman's movie but the movie was directed by James Mangold right?
The Wolverine was directed by him, yes. He also directed Walk the Line and Identity, among a bunch of others.
Ok, I don't like Walk the Line, which other movie will you recommend?
resp: He also directed Girl, Interrupted and Cop Land. Both of those are drama movies. One of my favorite genres, personally.
